casebody.data:
John G. Scott v. Pedro Montells. Decided April 6, 1885. Exceptions of both sides ordered to be heard at general term. Alfred I. Walker and David L. Walter, for plaintiff. Kent & Auerbach, and Geo. W. Cotterill, for defendant.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., O’Gorman, and Ingraham, JJ.

Opinion by O’Gorman, J.

Exceptions overruled, and judgment for plaintiff ordered on verdict.
